columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the cache.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The resource ID of the cache.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: ARM provisioning state. Possible values include: 'Succeeded', 'Failed', 'Cancelled', 'Creating', 'Deleting', 'Updating'.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the cache.

columns.name: cache_size_gb
columns.description: The size of the cache, in GB.

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: The SKU for the cache.

columns.name: subnet
columns.description: Subnet used for the cache.

columns.name: directory_services_settings
columns.description: Specifies directory services settings of the cache.

columns.name: encryption_settings
columns.description: Specifies encryption settings of the cache.

columns.name: health
columns.description: The health of the cache.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: The identity of the cache, if configured.

columns.name: mount_addresses
columns.description: Array of IP addresses that can be used by clients mounting the cache.

columns.name: network_settings
columns.description: Specifies network settings of the cache.

columns.name: security_settings
columns.description: Specifies security settings of the cache.

columns.name: system_data
columns.description: The system meta data relating to the resource.

columns.name: upgrade_status
columns.description: Upgrade status of the cache.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
